about_the_game:
WARNING:
This content is currently available for FREE. You can purchase the DLC to keep lifetime access to these units. Future audits may complete it with new content as well. If you cannot afford a subscription you can still support the project with a DLC. THANK YOU!

This DLC grants you lifetime access to the following T0 equipment (pre-1940):
  • German army
    • PaK 36 (37mm) Anti-Tank Gun
  • British expeditionary forces
    • British 2 Pounder (40mm) Anti-Tank Gun
  • French army
    • French SA mle 34 (25mm) Anti-Tank Gun
  • US army
    • US SA mle 34 (25mm) Anti-Tank Gun)
Upon purchase, these vehicles will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the spawn you have selected.

WARNING:
This content is currently available for FREE. You can purchase the DLC to keep lifetime access to these units. Future audits may provide it with new content as well. If you cannot afford a subscription you can support the project with a DLC.

Controls

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

name: Light AT Gun Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

short_description: Become an anti-tank gunner and destroy enemy light tanks, medium tanks and armored cars. Your armored piercing rounds well placed will have devastating effects against early war vehicles! Deploy-able at mobile spawns!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
